headline: KKR Prices $900,000,000 of 5.100% Senior Notes due 2035
summary: NEW YORK, August 04, 2025--KKR & Co. Inc. ("KKR") (NYSE: KKR) today announced that it has priced its previously announced offering of $900,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 5.100% Senior Notes due 2035 (the "notes"). The notes will be senior obligations of KKR and will be fully and unconditionally guaranteed by KKR Group Partnership L.P.

headline: KKR Announces Offering of Senior Notes
summary: NEW YORK, August 04, 2025--KKR & Co. Inc. ("KKR") (NYSE: KKR) today announced that it has commenced an offering of senior notes (the "notes"), subject to market and other conditions. The notes will be senior obligations of KKR and will be fully and unconditionally guaranteed by KKR Group Partnership L.P.

The notes will be senior obligations of KKR and will be fully and unconditionally guaranteed by KKR Group Partnership L.P.

headline: The Zacks Analyst Blog Highlights Oracle, Disney and KKR
summary: Oracle, Disney, and KKR post strong gains as cloud momentum, park revenues, and AUM growth fuel investor optimism.
